name: Figma Links Playground + Game
description:
Figma supports links! You can use them to direct people to specs and bug boards (or anywhere on the internet), to navigate within or between Figma files, and to represent links in your production design work. Learn more about how to use links like a pro â€“ and learn more about the history of hyperlinks in a little game we put together.

(Press Duplicate in the upper right corner to play!)
